description:
This market refers to the Rocket League match between Shopify Rebellion and Ninjas in Pyjamas in the RLCS Major Boston Playoffs, scheduled for February 21 at 3:30PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Shopify Rebellion" if Shopify Rebellion win the match against Ninjas in Pyjamas.

This market will resolve to "Ninjas in Pyjamas" if Ninjas in Pyjamas win the match against Shopify Rebellion.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/rocketleague/Main_Page. However, if https://liquipedia.net/rocketleague/Main_Page has not published final results within 2 hours after the event’s conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead including video evidence.

markets.description:
This market refers to the Rocket League match between Shopify Rebellion and Ninjas in Pyjamas in the RLCS Major Boston Playoffs, scheduled for February 21 at 3:30PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Over" if Shopify Rebellion and Ninjas in Pyjamas play 5 or more games in this series.

If fewer than 5 games are played, this market will resolve to "Under".

Games won by forfeit, disqualification, walkover, or default are counted towards the total, provided that the match is completed.

If the match is canceled (not played at all for any reason), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's match forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends due to the clinching game being forfeited this will count as a completed match.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/rocketleague/Main_Page. However, if https://liquipedia.net/rocketleague/Main_Page has not published final results within 2 hours after the event’s conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead including video evidence.
